## Germplasm Phenotype:
   - [fst1]()&nbsp;---&nbsp;The fst1 mutant results in strong reduction of beta-1,2-linked flavonol glycosides (sophorosides) on the pollen of Arabidopsis. Vitality and fertility appear identical to the wild type under standard greenhouse conditions.
